channel.title: Charts on Paolo Prem
channel.description: Recent content in Charts on Paolo Prem

item.title: My favorite albums
item.description: This is a list of all my favorite albums of all time. It is not supposed to have an order, I will simply put a new album if I think that album is one of the greatest album ever done (of those I listened to so far). WARNING: this site is currently under development as well as the content of this page! Uncle Meat - Frank Zappa Absolutely my favorite Zappa album.
